Date: 2024-12-06 11:35

Hi Ashok,

 

Hope all is well.

 

I will call you in the afternoon if that is fine.

 

Let us draft an e-mail to Dee with what exactly is required so that we have a higher chance of getting a quotation that will be viable.

 

Best Regards,

Hagop

 

HAGOP GHAZARIAN​​​​

Hi Hagop,

 

Sending you an email one to one on the cyber quote subjectivities:

 

1: Normal requirement 

2&3: This would be a requirement to understand the MFA and EDR. 

4,5,6: Its just a description that is required 

7: Phishing training is just employees awareness for links and scams

8- This should be confirmed as the RI needs to know if the proposal form applies to all - it's just a confirmation

9- Loss history, standard requirement

10 & 11 If you could check internally

12,13 and 14: Normal requirement 

 

Thanks and regards,

 

Ashok Peter Eapen Dip CII, FRM

Regional Director, General Insurance (Financial Lines & Engineering)

ID: C1CDBOB_01
From: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
To: Ashok Eapen <Ashok.Eapen@nascodirect.com>
CC: Hrishikesh Oturkar <hrishikesh.oturkar@nascodubai.com>; Diana Haydar <Diana.Haydar@nascodubai.com>
BCC: 
Date: 2025-03-03 13:14
Subject: RE: Cyber- note on subjectivities
--------------------------------------------------
Dear Ashok,

 

Please find below the relevant updates:

 

*	MFA is fully rolled out for all remote access to the Chalhoub network groupwide, as well as for all web-based email access as from March 1.
*	All Chalhoub-managed brands are within the Chalhoub network.
*	Please note that we have VPN tunnels with COTY, Shiseido, LVMH, Etoile. However, as agreed, the cyber insurance will only cover losses to managed companies. 
*	List of all registered Internet domain names used to:

	*	Market the business
	*	Provide information about the business
	*	Operate the business 

 

For the loss history, please advise suitable timings for a final meeting with Dee as she will advise the details over the Teams call. Wednesday 11-12PM or 3-4PM Dubai time.

 

Also, this will be a chance to get clarification on the final details from your side and from our cyber team.

 

Best Regards,

Hagop

 

HAGOP GHAZARIAN​​​​

SPECIALIST ‑ ADMINISTRATION

For the loss history, please advise suitable timings for a final meeting with Dee as she will advise the details over the Teams call. Wednesday 11-12PM or 3-4PM Dubai time.

Best Regards,

Hagop

 

HAGOP GHAZARIAN​​​​
